channel.title: 802.11ax on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in 802.11ax on Cisco Skills

item.title: Wireless VLANs
item.description: It’s been fun four months of 2018 so far and I’m back to talk about Wireless VLANs. With 802.11ax around the corner (2019) I think we all can agree that “weird” connections although less likely have interference isn’t as mobile as a wireless LAN. Also, with 802.11ax the maximum theoretical throughput is 10Gbps! We’re going to need some serious backend infrastructure available to be able to support that type of bandwidth.
